== Short description

You can define checks for submitting subscription settings in this template.

== Template ValidatorScheduler

=== Variables

These variables are available in this container.

* $SchedulerDate — Returns the subscription's starting date.
* $SchedulerInterval — Returns the subscription's ending date.
* $SchedulerRepeating — Returns the number of deliveries for the subscription.
